headline: RTX Strengthens Its Position in Military Radar Market With Innovation
summary: RTX advances in the global military radar race with new GaN-powered systems, boosting its Raytheon unit's growth and defense market reach.

headline: RTX Corp: Strong Backlog, Soaring Valuation -- Is the Stock Still a Buy?
summary: Strong fundamentals and record backlog power RTX's future, though valuations look stretched.

headline: RTX's Raytheon begins initial production of SharpSight surveillance radar
summary: Raytheon, an RTX (NYSE: RTX) business, has launched the initial production of its new SharpSight multi-domain surveillance radar. This next-generation system will provide high-altitude, real-time, high-resolution imaging with wide-area search and tracking for land and maritime surveillance, operating day or night in any weather condition.
